body.name: Classic Brands Cool Gel Gel Memory Foam 8-Inch Mattress | CertiPUR-US Certified | Bed-in-a-Box, Short Queen
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 35 mins
body.description: Classic Brands Ventilated 8-inch Cool Gel Memory Foam Mattress is the latest technology in memory foam mattresses. One layer of 2 inches of gel-infused memory foam draws heat away from your body and allows breathability. The second layer beneath consists of 6 inches of high-density memory foam that conforms to your body providing support, pressure point relief, and proper spinal alignment for a great night's sleep. Perfect for kid’s rooms, college dorms, and guest rooms, this mattress is a great value for any room in the house. Please allow 24 to 72 hours for your Mattress to regain its full shape The Cool Gel 8-inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress combines two leading sleep technologies at an incredible value. Gel-infused memory foam keeps you cool during sleep and body-contouring memory foam reduces pressure points and properly aligns the spine. Gel draws heat away from the body and creates a cooler sleep surface and aids in preventing excessive tossing and turning so you can get a more restful night's sleep. The feel of this gel memory foam mattress is medium firm - slightly plusher than a traditional firm mattress and it’s adjustable base friendly. Benefits of Gel Memory Foam A gel memory foam mattress can support each part of the body evenly and individually. Gel Memory foam slowly and automatically adjusts to your body weight and temperature. In addition to the slow, conforming response, gel memory foam offers complete, luxurious and stress-free support. Additionally, when you do move in bed, memory foam gently 'fills in' and reshapes itself to your new sleeping posture, cradling every contour of your body. The Latest Gel Memory Foam Technology Gel Memory Foam is a unique material that infuses gel particles into visco-elastic memory foam, creating a plusher and cooler sleeping material. Gel memory foam is more porous or open than conventional foam meaning the cells are interconnected unlike closed cell foam; thereby is more breathable and comfortable than higher density visco-elastic foam. The open-celled physical structure of our foams is self-ventilating. Air travels throughout the material and dissipates body heat regulating your body temperature. Why Buy a Cool Gel Memory Foam Mattress? Cool Gel mattresses with gel infused memory foam disperse body heat and create a cooler sleeping surface while retaining the pressure-relieving properties of traditional memory foam. Tossing and turning are dramatically diminished and disrupted sleep patterns are greatly eliminated so you can sleep longer without moving and enjoy the benefits of a deeper, more restful sleep pattern. CertiPUR-US Certified Classic Brands gel memory foam mattresses are CertiPUR-US Certified. The CertiPUR-US program is a voluntary testing, analysis and certification program for flexible polyurethane foam used as a cushioning material in home furnishings such as adult mattresses, crib mattresses, upholstered furniture and some accessory comfort products. Certified flexible polyurethane foams have been independently laboratory tested. Get it Right the First Time It is also a good idea to know the size and the height of your mattress ahead of time to make sure you are ordering the correct size. Keep in mind that you should combine the height of your bed frame, foundation, or adjustable bed base with the height of your mattress to get a gauge of the how tall your sleep system will be. Twin Size - 39" W x 75" L x 8" H Twin XL Size - 39" W x 80" L x 8" H Full Size - 54" W x 75" L x 8" H Queen Size – 60" W x 80" L x 8" H King Size – 76" W x 80" L x 8" H California King Size – 72" W x 84" L x 8" H Classic Brands Smart Packaging Classic Brands also uses Smart Packaging. Smart packaging reduces the carbon footprint in the manufacturers shipping process. Our advanced packaging technology means we can roll-pack our mattresses and ship them at one-third of the normal size. Because of this process, we can ship more mattresses per delivery and reduce the amount of carbon emissions. A mattress that is roll-packed still retains its initial quality, as each will quickly recover and return to its original shape after being removed from its packaging. Quality Assurance The Classic Brands Ventilated 8-inch Cool Gel Memory Foam Mattress is backed with a 10-year worry-free warranty. Look for more innovative specialty sleep products from Classic Brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, very comfortable
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE, 5 YEARS LATER: Its been 5 years now. Still sleeping on this mattress and i still love it, its still very comfortable. To this day, i consider this mattress some of the best money i ever spent. Im happy to see the company is still making them. If you havent bought one yet i really suggest getting one, the mattress is of very high quality and its held up to the abuse of my toddlers, cats, and me sleeping on it filthy from work for years and it still has no odor and looks great. Fantastic value! Will update again in 2021!UPDATE, 4 YEARS LATER: I have now had this mattress for 4 years. It has held up VERY well. There is a slightly noticeable "slump" in the mattress in the middle due to use, but like i said you cant really notice it. It is still very comfortable and i still sleep very good on it. FULLY RECOMMENDED to anyone looking for a good cheap mattress that is comfortable. I plan on buying a 2nd one.This mattress takes quite some time to get used to, especially when you have slept on traditional mattresses your entire life. It felt overly firm to me to the point of where it hurt my back for a few weeks, but after it got broken in it was very comfortable. The sour chemical smell coming from it lasted for 4 days, even with a fan blowing on it 24/7 with an open window right next to it. The "cool gel" works, i have yet to get overly hot or sweaty sleeping on it. If you are looking for a very cheap mattress thats semi-comfortable and sleeps cool, this one is worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: The mattress is very sturdy and comfortable. I can sit on the side of the bed without falling off ,but at the same time it is still soft. A very good middle ground and great four our 4 year old's bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We purchased 4 of these for two twin size trundle beds Mattresses came quickly and are boxed/packaged very well. The box even included a plastic/metal “letter” cutter to be used when slicing open the plastic. Each mattress popped up quickly onto full shape. No weird smells, no need to “air it out”. I laid down on each one and they are firm and comfortable. Would buy them again and agin if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars complely worth every penny
reviews.reviewText: bought this bed as my old one had become infested with bedbugs. but as someone who lives in florida, the heat can get overwhelming. so i wanted to find something that would relieve me from the daily heat ad humidity. i dont have a ceiling fan in my room and the a/c doesnt seem to cool much. so while i may not experience a "cooling sensation" during rest, its much cooler than my previous spring mattress. dont be afraid to buy it though, this thing is a solid purchase. its comfortable, spacious, doesnt make much noise (if you know what i mean), and sturdy enough that it wont let your body sink to the bedframe. set up was a breeze, definitely heavy to lug by yourself unless your a weightlifter i guess. like many other reviews the inflation process was way shorter than 24 hours like it suggests. i set it up at night along with my bedframe and i was sleeping on it the same night. i did wait a couple hours atleast though. there is a smell to the mattress that you can tell is definitely from the material used, its not a disgusting smell, but bearable and goes away in time. some febreeze and airwick can take care of that. the price was unbeatable and it has a 10 year warranty. if you have some extra coin, maybe go with the 10inch, but the 8inch king is just as good. especially in my case where i had a budget. plus i kinda like the lower to the ground beds anyway. almost adds sort of an oriental style to my room. overall, this sure beats going to mattress firm, finding someone with a truck or paying the dudes at the store to drop it off. plus you wont find this kinda price for a king size at one of those places. i would defiitely buy again. hope this helps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable mattress. I love that these come in a box. Mattress was very well wrapped within the box and also included was a tool to cut the plastic off without cutting the mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this mattress!
reviews.reviewText: This mattress is FIRM. If that’s not what you’re looking for, this isn’t for you. It’s very firm and exactly what I was looking for! I’m happy with my purchase so far…. Happy sleeping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Toddler Bed
reviews.reviewText: My 4-year-old really loves his new bed. We just upgraded him from his toddler bed to a loft bed, and we purchased this excellent mattress for him. We let it sit for 2-days after removing the plastic and it expanded really nicely. It feels good to me, but I'm not the one sleeping on it - so far my son absolutely loves the mattress. The tell-tale for me is that he sleeps through the night and has not complained about any discomfort. He tends to sleep hot, but this mattress seems to keep him nice and cool, or at least, it does not heat him up. I'm very happy with this purchase, and when our daughter is ready to graduate from a toddler bed, I will not hesitate to buy another one of these for her.I'd also like to mention that the shipping company got mixed up and practically lost our order. I filed a report through Amazon, and these guys (Classic Brands) handled it quickly, sending me a replacement immediately! 5-Star product and a 5-Star company!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this for the spare room for company and have ended up having to sleep on it for about a week now with no problems. Was concerned at first about it being too firm but it's been fine and have sept well .Good product for the price.

Es un buen producto, ya llevo dos años con él y no he tenido algun problema.Se amolda cómodamente al cuerpo y te hace descansar de una manera agradable.No se ha deformado este tiempo ni tampoco ha bajado su nivel de inflación.Cuando lo compré estaba en oferta y puedo decir que ha sido la mejor elección.

La mayoria de colchones memory foam tienen precios muy elevado pero este por la calidad que ofrece es una buena compra.Este colchon es firme no esperen que se sienta como una nube pero se amolda al cuerpo y se siente muy bien.Solamente hay que dejarlo a que se asiente durante el periodo que dice (1 a 3 dias)

Sin palabras! Simplemente genial, la comodidad y suavidad de este tipo de colchones memory foam es más que excelente para el descanso y dolores de espalda. Lo recomiendo ampliamente. El envío llego en tiempo y forma.

Es muy bueno, apenas llevamos una semana de uso pero no ha dado ningun problema. Trae funda asi que si por algo se llega a ensuciar la puedes quitar y echar a lavar. Es cómodo, es muy suave, a mi me gusta pero si estas buscando un colchón rígido no es para ti. Además a muy buen precio comparado con otros de memory foam

reviews.reviewTitle: Un colchón de muy buena calidad, firme pero ergonómico.
reviews.reviewText: Es un colchón con el que he descansado bastante desde la primera noche, el memory es muy fresco y además muy dinámico. Nunca creí poder lograr dormir de una manera tan cómoda en un colchón que no le pide nada a los clásicos de marca. No sientes la presión y se adapta muy bien al cuerpo, además tiene muy buen soporte.
